column1: 交付价值是软件工程中非常重要的一环。|Delivering value is a crucial aspect in software engineering.|jiāofù jiàzhí shì ruǎnjiàn gōngchéng zhōng fēicháng zhòngyào de yīhuán.|sentences
我们团队一直致力于交付价值最大化。|Our team is dedicated to maximizing the delivery of value.|wǒmen tuánduì yīzhí zhìlì yú jiāofù jiàzhí zuìdà huà.|sentences
交付价值需要团队的协作和努力。|Delivering value requires teamwork and effort.|jiāofù jiàzhí xūyào tuánduì de xiézuò hé nǔlì.|sentences
只有理解客户需求才能真正实现交付价值。|Only by understanding customer needs can we truly deliver value.|zhǐyǒu lǐjiě kèhù xūqiú cáinéng zhēnzhèng shíxiàn jiāofù jiàzhí.|sentences
拓扑是网络拓扑结构的一种。|Topology is a type of network topology structure.|Tuòpū shì wǎngluò tuòpū jiégòu de yī zhǒng.|sentences
业务需要是我们团队的首要任务。|Meeting the business needs is the top priority for our team.|Yèwù xūyào shì wǒmen tuánduì de shǒuyào rènwù.|sentences
在软件工程中，拓扑可以用来描述系统的结构。|In software engineering, topology can be used to describe the structure of a system.|Zài ruǎnjiàn gōngchéng zhōng, tuòpū kěyǐ yòng lái miáoshù xìtǒng de jiégòu.|sentences
我们必须根据业务需要来制定计划。|We must develop plans based on business requirements.|Wǒmen bìxū gēnjù yèwù xūyào lái zhìdìng jìhuà.|sentences
拓扑分析是网络安全领域中的重要概念。|Topology analysis is an important concept in the field of network security.|Tuòpū fēnxī shì wǎngluò ānquán lǐngyù zhōng de zhòngyào gàiniàn.|sentences
业务需要的变化可能会影响我们的项目进度。|Changes in business requirements may impact the progress of our project.|Yèwù xūyào de biànhuà kěnéng huì yǐngxiǎng wǒmen de xiàngmù jìndù.|sentences
学习拓扑需要深入理解网络结构和连接方式。|Studying topology requires a deep understanding of network structure and connection methods.|Xuéxí tuòpū xūyào shēnrù lǐjiě wǎngluò jiégòu hé liánjiē fāngshì.|sentences
我们需要确保业务需要与客户期望保持一致。|We need to ensure that business requirements align with customer expectations.|Wǒmen xūyào quèbǎo yèwù xūyào yǔ kèhù qīwàng bǎochí yīzhì.|sentences
基础设施是软件开发过程中至关重要的一部分。|Infrastructure is a crucial part of the software development process.|jīchǔ shèshī shì ruǎnjiàn kāifā guòchéng zhōng zhìguān zhòngyào de yī bùfèn.|sentences
好的基础设施可以提高团队的工作效率。|Good infrastructure can improve the efficiency of the team's work.|hǎo de jīchǔ shèshī kěyǐ tígāo tuánduì de gōngzuò xiàolǜ.|sentences
基础设施的建设需要投入大量的时间和资源。|Building infrastructure requires a significant amount of time and resources.|jīchǔ shèshī de jiànshè xūyào tóurù dàliàng de shíjiān hé zīyuán.|sentences
在软件开发中，基础设施的稳定性至关重要。|In software development, the stability of infrastructure is crucial.|zài ruǎnjiàn kāifā zhōng, jīchǔ shèshī de wěndìngxìng zhìguān zhòngyào.|sentences
项目预算超支是一个常见的问题。|Project budget overrun is a common issue.|xiàngmù yùsuàn chāozhī shì yīgè chángjiàn de wèntí.|sentences
我们需要采取措施来避免项目预算超支。|We need to take measures to avoid project budget overrun.|wǒmen xūyào cǎiqǔ cuòshī lái bìmiǎn xiàngmù yùsuàn chāozhī.|sentences
项目预算超支可能会导致项目延期。|Project budget overrun may lead to project delays.|xiàngmù yùsuàn chāozhī kěnéng huì dǎozhì xiàngmù yánqī.|sentences
我们应该在项目启动前制定好预算以避免超支。|We should establish a budget before starting the project to avoid overrun.|wǒmen yīnggāi zài xiàngmù qǐdòng qián zhìdìng hǎo yùsuàn yǐ bìmiǎn chāozhī.|sentences
架构是软件开发中非常重要的一部分。|Architecture is a very important part of software development.|Jiàgòu shì ruǎnjiàn kāifā zhōng fēicháng zhòngyào de yī bùfèn.|sentences
好的架构可以提高软件的性能和可维护性。|Good architecture can improve the performance and maintainability of software.|Hǎo de jiàgòu kěyǐ tígāo ruǎnjiàn de xìngnéng hé kě wèihù xìng.|sentences
架构设计需要考虑到系统的扩展性和灵活性。|Architectural design needs to consider the scalability and flexibility of the system.|Jiàgòu shèjì xūyào kǎolǜ dào xìtǒng de kuòzhǎn xìng hé línghuó xìng.|sentences
架构师的工作是设计出高效且可靠的系统架构。|The job of an architect is to design efficient and reliable system architecture.|Jiàgòu shī de gōngzuò shì shèjì chū gāoxiào qiě kěkào de xìtǒng jiàgòu.|sentences
官僚主义是一种阻碍创新和进步的现象。|Bureaucracy is a phenomenon that hinders innovation and progress.|guānliáo zhǔyì shì yī zhǒng zǔ'ài chuàngxīn hé jìnbù de xiànxiàng.|sentences
在科技行业中，官僚主义可能导致项目进展缓慢。|In the technology industry, bureaucracy may lead to slow project progress.|zài kējì hángyè zhōng, guānliáo zhǔyì kěnéng dǎozhì xiàngmù jìnzhǎn huǎnmàn.|sentences
要避免官僚主义，团队需要保持灵活性和创新精神。|To avoid bureaucracy, teams need to maintain flexibility and innovation spirit.|yào bìmiǎn guānliáo zhǔyì, tuánduì xūyào bǎochí línghuó xìng hé chuàngxīn jīngshén.|sentences
官僚主义可能导致决策过程变得复杂和低效。|Bureaucracy may lead to the decision-making process becoming complex and inefficient.|guānliáo zhǔyì kěnéng dǎozhì juécè guòchéng biàn dé fùzá hé dīxiào.|sentences
函数是编程中非常重要的概念。|Functions are a very important concept in programming.|hán shù shì biān chéng zhōng fēi cháng zhòng yào de gài niàn.|sentences
在软件开发中，函数可以帮助我们更好地组织代码。|In software development, functions can help us better organize code.|zài ruǎn jiàn kāi fā zhōng, hán shù kě yǐ bāng zhù wǒ men gèng hǎo de zǔ zhī dài mǎ.|sentences
函数可以接受参数并返回结果。|Functions can take parameters and return results.|hán shù kě yǐ jiē shòu cān shù bìng fǎn huí jié guǒ.|sentences
学习函数的使用需要一定的时间和练习。|Learning how to use functions requires some time and practice.|xué xí hán shù de shǐ yòng xū yào yī dìng de shí jiān hé liàn xí.|sentences
这份文档包含了所有必要的信息。|This document contains all the necessary information.|Zhè fèn wén dàng bāo hán le suǒ yǒu bì yào de xìn xī.|sentences
请确保您已经阅读了文档中的所有内容。|Please make sure you have read all the content in the document.|Qǐng què bǎo nín yǐ jīng yuè dú le wén dàng zhōng de suǒ yǒu nèi róng.|sentences
文档中的示例代码可以帮助您更好地理解。|The sample code in the document can help you better understand.|Wén dàng zhōng de shì lì dài mǎ kě yǐ bāng zhù nín gèng hǎo de lǐ jiě.|sentences
如果您有任何疑问，请查阅文档中的常见问题部分。|If you have any questions, please refer to the FAQ section in the document.|Rú guǒ nín yǒu rèn hé yí wèn, qǐng chá yuè wén dàng zhōng de cháng jiàn wèn tí bù fèn.|sentences
迭代是软件开发中的重要概念。|Iteration is an important concept in software development.|dié dài shì ruǎn jiàn kāi fā zhōng de zhòng yào gài niàn.|sentences
在敏捷开发中，迭代是持续改进的关键。|In agile development, iteration is the key to continuous improvement.|zài mǐn jié kāi fā zhōng, dié dài shì chí xù gǎi jìn de guān jiàn.|sentences

迭代过程中，团队需要不断反馈并调整。|During the iteration process, the team needs to constantly provide feedback and make adjustments.|dié dài guò chéng zhōng, tuán duì xū yào bù duàn fǎn kuí bìng tiáo zhěng.|sentences
迭代开发模式有助于降低项目风险。|Iterative development model helps reduce project risks.|dié dài kāi fā mó shì yǒu zhù yú jiàng dī xiàng mù fēng xiǎn.|sentences
基础设施是软件开发中至关重要的一部分。|Infrastructure is a crucial part of software development.|Jīchǔ shèshī shì ruǎnjiàn kāifā zhōng zhì guānzhòng de yī bùfèn.|sentences
在构建软件时，基础设施的稳定性至关重要。|The stability of infrastructure is crucial when building software.|Zài gòubiān ruǎnjiàn shí, jīchǔ shèshī de wěndìngxìng zhì guānzhòng.|sentences
基础设施的完善可以提高软件的效率和性能。|Improving infrastructure can enhance the efficiency and performance of software.|Jīchǔ shèshī de wánshàn kěyǐ tígāo ruǎnjiàn de xiàolǜ hé xìngnéng.|sentences
了解基础设施的原理对软件工程师至关重要。|Understanding the principles of infrastructure is crucial for software engineers.|Liǎojiě jīchǔ shèshī de yuánlǐ duì ruǎnjiàn gōngchéngshī zhì guānzhòng.|sentences

示意图是软件工程中常用的工具，用于展示系统的整体架构。|A schematic diagram is a commonly used tool in software engineering to illustrate the overall architecture of a system.|Shìyì tú shì ruǎnjiàn gōngchéng zhōng chángyòng de gōngjù, yòngyú zhǎnshì xìtǒng de zhěngtǐ jiàgòu.|sentences

在设计软件时，示意图可以帮助开发人员更好地理解系统的设计。|When designing software, a schematic diagram can help developers better understand the system's design.|Zài shèjì ruǎnjiàn shí, shìyì tú kěyǐ bāngzhù kāifā rényuán gèng hǎo de lǐjiě xìtǒng de shèjì.|sentences

示意图可以简洁地展示系统的关键部分，方便团队成员之间的沟通和协作。|A schematic diagram can concisely display the key parts of a system, facilitating communication and collaboration among team members.|Shìyì tú kěyǐ jiǎnjié de zhǎnshì xìtǒng de guānjiàn bùfèn, fāngbiàn tuánduì chéngyuán zhījiān de gōutōng hé xiézuò.|sentences

示意图的使用不仅可以提高软件开发效率，还可以减少沟通误解。|The use of schematic diagrams can not only improve software development efficiency but also reduce communication misunderstandings.|Shìyì tú de shǐyòng bùjǐn kěyǐ tígāo ruǎnjiàn kāifā xiàolǜ, hái kěyǐ jiǎnshǎo gōutōng wùjiě.|sentences

全栈工程师是一种多才多艺的职业，需要精通前端和后端技术。|A full-stack engineer is a versatile profession that requires proficiency in both front-end and back-end technologies.|Quánzhàn gōngchéngshī shì yī zhǒng duō cái duō yì de zhíyè, xūyào jīngtōng qián duān hé hòu duān jìshù.|sentences

全栈开发人员需要具备全面的技术知识，能够独立完成整个项目的开发工作。|Full-stack developers need to have comprehensive technical knowledge and be able to independently complete the development work of the entire project.|Quánzhàn kāifā rényuán xūyào jùbèi quánmiàn de jìshù zhīshì, nénggòu dúlì wánchéng zhěnggè xiàngmù de kāifā gōngzuò.|sentences

全栈工程师不仅需要掌握技术，还需要具备良好的沟通能力和团队合作精神。|Full-stack engineers not only need to master technology, but also need to have good communication skills and a spirit of teamwork.|Quánzhàn gōngchéngshī bùjǐn xūyào zhǎngwò jìshù, hái xūyào jùbèi liánghǎo de gōutōng nénglì hé tuánduì hézuò jīngshén.|sentences

全栈开发人员在项目中扮演着连接前后端的桥梁角色，需要具备全局观和解决问题的能力。|Full-stack developers play the role of a bridge connecting the front-end and back-end in projects, requiring a global perspective and problem-solving skills.|Quánzhàn kāifā rényuán zài xiàngmù zhōng bànyǎn zhe liánjiē qián hòu duān de qiáoliáng juésè, xūyào jùbèi quánjú guān hé jiějué wèntí de nénglì.|sentences

重试队列是一个用于存储需要重新执行的任务的数据结构。|The retry queue is a data structure used to store tasks that need to be executed again.|Chóngshì duìliè shì yīgè yòngyú cúnchú xūyào chóngxíng de rènwù de shùjù jiégòu.|sentences

当系统出现故障时，重试队列可以帮助确保任务能够成功完成。|When the system encounters a failure, the retry queue can help ensure that tasks are successfully completed.|Dāng xìtǒng chūxiàn gùzhàng shí, chóngshì duìliè kěyǐ bāngzhù quèbǎo rènwù nénggòu chénggōng wánchéng.|sentences

重试队列的设计需要考虑到任务的优先级和执行顺序。|The design of the retry queue needs to take into account the priority and execution order of tasks.|Chóngshì duìliè de shèjì xūyào kǎokǎo dào rènwù de yōuxiānjí hé zhíxíng shùnxù.|sentences

在软件开发中，重试队列是一个常见的解决方案，用于处理临时性的错误。|In software development, the retry queue is a common solution used to handle temporary errors.|Zài ruǎnjiàn kāifā zhōng, chóngshì duìliè shì yīgè chángjiàn de jiějué fāng'àn, yòngyú chǔlǐ línshíxìng de cuòwù.|sentences
部署是软件开发中非常重要的一步。|Deployment is a crucial step in software development.|Bùshǔ shì ruǎnjiàn kāifā zhōng fēicháng zhòngyào de yībù.|sentences
我们需要确保部署过程顺利进行。|We need to ensure the deployment process goes smoothly.|Wǒmen xūyào quèbǎo bùshǔ guòchéng shùnlì jìnxíng.|sentences
部署完成后，我们可以开始测试阶段。|After deployment is complete, we can start the testing phase.|Bùshǔ wánchéng hòu, wǒmen kěyǐ kāishǐ cèshì jiēduàn.|sentences
部署过程中需要注意安全性和稳定性。|Security and stability should be taken into consideration during the deployment process.|Bùshǔ guòchéng zhōng xūyào zhùyì ānquán xìng hé wěndìngxìng.|sentences
这个软件服务非常方便。|This software service is very convenient.|Zhège ruǎnjiàn fúwù fēicháng fāngbiàn.|sentences
我们需要一个高效的服务来解决这个问题。|We need an efficient service to solve this problem.|Wǒmen xūyào yīgè gāoxiào de fúwù lái jiějué zhège wèntí.|sentences
这家公司提供的服务质量很高。|The quality of service provided by this company is very high.|Zhè jiā gōngsī tígōng de fúwù zhìliàng hěn gāo.|sentences
我们需要一个全方位的服务来满足客户的需求。|We need a comprehensive service to meet the needs of our customers.|Wǒmen xūyào yīgè quánfāngwèi de fúwù lái mǎnzú kèhù de xūqiú.|sentences
负载均衡是一种用于分配网络或应用程序负载的技术。|Load balancing is a technology used to distribute network or application loads.|fùzài jūnhéng shì yī zhǒng yòngyú fēnpèi wǎngluò huò yìngyòng chéngshì de jìshù.|sentences

在大型网络中，负载均衡可以提高系统的性能和可靠性。|In large networks, load balancing can improve system performance and reliability.|zài dàxíng wǎngluò zhōng, fùzài jūnhéng kěyǐ tígāo xìtǒng de xìngnéng hé kěkàoxìng.|sentences
负载均衡可以确保服务器资源的最佳利用。|Load balancing can ensure the optimal use of server resources.|fùzài jūnhéng kěyǐ quèbǎo fúwùqì zīyuán de zuìjiā lìyòng.|sentences
负载均衡技术在云计算中起着重要作用。|Load balancing technology plays a crucial role in cloud computing.|fùzài jūnhéng jìshù zài yún jìsuàn zhōng qǐzhe zhòngyào zuòyòng.|sentences
运维是软件开发过程中至关重要的一环。|Operations and maintenance are crucial parts of the software development process.|Yùnwéi shì ruǎnjiàn kāifā guòchéng zhōng zhìguān zhòngyào de yī huán.|sentences
在运维工作中，需要不断优化系统性能。|In operations and maintenance work, it is necessary to continuously optimize system performance.|Zài yùnwéi gōngzuò zhōng, xūyào bùduàn yōuhuà xìtǒng xìngnéng.|sentences
运维人员需要具备扎实的技术功底。|Operations and maintenance personnel need to have a solid technical foundation.|Yùnwéi rényuán xūyào jùbèi zhāshí de jìshù gōngdǐ.|sentences
运维工作需要高度的责任心和团队合作精神。|Operations and maintenance work requires a high level of responsibility and teamwork spirit.|Yùnwéi gōngzuò xūyào gāodù de zérèn xīn hé tuánduì hézuò jīngshén.|sentences
启动软件|Start the software|qǐdòng ruǎnjiàn|sentences
启动过程很快|The startup process is very fast|qǐdòng guòchéng hěn kuài|sentences
请启动您的设备|Please start your device|qǐng qǐdòng nín de shèbèi|sentences
启动失败，请重试|Startup failed, please try again|qǐdòng shībài, qǐng chóngshì|sentences
配置中心是软件开发中非常重要的一环。|The configuration center is a very important part in software development.|Pèizhì zhōngxīn shì ruǎnjiàn kāifā zhōng fēicháng zhòngyào de yīhuán.|sentences
在配置中心中，我们可以集中管理所有的配置信息。|In the configuration center, we can centrally manage all configuration information.|Zài pèizhì zhōngxīn zhōng, wǒmen kěyǐ jízhōng guǎnlǐ suǒyǒu de pèizhì xìnxī.|sentences
配置中心的设计需要考虑到系统的可扩展性。|The design of the configuration center needs to consider the scalability of the system.|Pèizhì zhōngxīn de shèjì xūyào kǎolǜ dào xìtǒng de kě kuòzhǎn xìng.|sentences
我们正在研究如何优化配置中心的性能。|We are researching how to optimize the performance of the configuration center.|Wǒmen zhèngzài yánjiū rúhé yōuhuà pèizhì zhōngxīn de xìngnéng.|sentences
同步操作是软件开发中常见的技术。|Synchronization operation is a common technique in software development.|Tóngbù cāozuò shì ruǎnjiàn kāifā zhōng chángjiàn de jìshù.|sentences
在团队协作中，同步数据是至关重要的。|In team collaboration, synchronizing data is crucial.|Zài tuánduì xiézuò zhōng, tóngbù shùjù shì zhìguān zhòngyào de.|sentences
我们需要确保不同设备之间的同步性。|We need to ensure synchronization between different devices.|Wǒmen xūyào quèbǎo bùtóng shèbèi zhījiān de tóngxìng.|sentences
同步技术的发展推动了软件行业的进步。|The development of synchronization technology has driven progress in the software industry.|Tóngbù jìshù de fāzhǎn tuīdòng le ruǎnjiàn hángyè de jìnbù.|sentences
模式是软件工程中的重要概念。|Pattern is an important concept in software engineering.|Móshì shì ruǎnjiàn gōngchéng zhōng de zhòngyào gàiniàn.|sentences

在软件开发过程中，选择合适的模式可以提高代码的质量。|In the software development process, choosing the right pattern can improve the quality of the code.|Zài ruǎnjiàn kāifā guòchéng zhōng, xuǎnzé héshì de móshì kěyǐ tígāo dàimǎ de zhìliàng.|sentences
模式设计模式是一种常见的编程范例。|Design patterns are a common programming paradigm.|Móshì shèjì móshì shì yī zhǒng chángjiàn de biānchéng fànlì.|sentences
了解不同的模式有助于提高软件设计的灵活性。|Understanding different patterns helps improve the flexibility of software design.|Liǎojiě bùtóng de móshì yǒuzhù yú tígāo ruǎnjiàn shèjì de líng huóxìng.|sentences
主从关系在软件工程中非常重要。|The master-slave relationship is very important in software engineering.|zhǔcóng guānxì zài ruǎnjiàn gōngchéng zhōng fēicháng zhòngyào.|sentences
在分布式系统中，主从节点之间需要保持同步。|In distributed systems, the master and slave nodes need to stay synchronized.|zài fēnbùshì xìtǒng zhōng, zhǔcóng jiédiǎn zhījiān xūyào bǎochí tóngbù.|sentences
主从复制是一种常见的数据库同步方式。|Master-slave replication is a common way of synchronizing databases.|zhǔcóng fùzhì shì yī zhǒng chángjiàn de shùjù tóngbù fāngshì.|sentences
